title: In-Game Borderless Window Problem (MAC)

embed.description: Image Screen Shot 2017 05 04 at 6 11 03 PM hosted in imgbb.com

body:
So this week I have experienced a problem with the in-game borderless window. I believe this began as soon as the mid-season tank rework came out. 

So I was just about to try out my main, Zac, who got reworked, but I noticed something different. I normally play the game on borderless at 1280x800 resolution. When the game loaded, I noticed that the borderless window did not even take up my whole screen. I can see my other running windows in the background space that the in-game window isn't taking up. I have not changed any of the settings before this problem occurred. I experimented with different resolutions but there was no help. PLEASE HELP! 

https://ibb.co/cSuXfk

As you can see there is space around my window that it doesn't take up, and this really bothers me. It was just fine before the mid-season update!

 I am currently running a mac with the latest updates. I can solve the problem by going into fullscreen but at  1440x900 resolution or higher. However, I prefer borderless so that I can switch to different applications with a keybind. which is not functional in fullscreen. I do like the mid-season update and my new {{champion:154}}, but please help me resolve this problem.
